mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM test t JOIN question q ON t.test_no = q.test_no JOIN paper p ON q.question_no = p.question_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM test where test_no = #{testNo} AND teacher_no = #{teacherNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test(test_title, test_memo, start_date, end_date, teacher_no) VALUES (#{testTitle}, #{testMemo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{teacherNo})
mapper.select: SELECT test_no testNo , test_title testTitle , test_memo testMemo , start_date startDate , end_date endDate , ts.teacher_no teacherNo , teacher_name teacherName FROM test ts JOIN teacher tc ON ts.teacher_no = tc.teacher_no WHERE ts.test_no = #{testNo} AND ts.teacher_no = #{teacherNo}

SELECT test_no testNo , test_title testTitle , test_memo testMemo , start_date startDate , end_date endDate , ts.teacher_no teacherNo , teacher_name teacherName FROM test ts JOIN teacher tc ON ts.teacher_no = tc.teacher_no WHERE ts.teacher_no = #{teacherNo}

SELECT test_no testNo , test_title testTitle , test_memo testMemo , start_date startDate , end_date endDate , ts.teacher_no teacherNo , teacher_name teacherName FROM test ts JOIN teacher tc ON ts.teacher_no = tc.teacher_no ORDER BY start_date
